About
About
As a services lead at xto10x, I help startups scale and succeed by providing them with data-driven insights, best practices, and strategic guidance. I have over eight years of experience in the fields of strategy, retail, and fintech, working with leading companies such as ZestMoney and Urban Ladder. I have a PGDM from IIM Indore and a B.Tech in Computer Science from Nirma University. I have strong analytical skills, team management skills, and market research skills, which I apply to deliver impactful solutions and outcomes for my clients. I am passionate about solving complex problems, creating value, and driving growth and innovation in the startup ecosystem. I thrive in a collaborative and dynamic environment, where I can leverage my diverse perspectives and experiences to contribute to the mission and vision of xto10x.
‚Ä¶see more

1mo ‚Ä¢ Edited ‚Ä¢ 
 1 month ago ‚Ä¢ Edited ‚Ä¢ Visible to anyone on or off LinkedIn
In recent months, we at xto10x have been speaking with founders and experts to develop a definitive point of view on GenAI applications in startups. Not to talk about the buzz, but to help companies move from curiosity to real deployment.

That means understanding how GenAI can drive measurable impact across functions: product, engineering, sales, customer support, marketing, and more. It also means understanding what‚Äôs hype and what‚Äôs real.

We have kickstarted several projects that may significantly increase the pace of Gen AI adoption in the ecosystem. We‚Äôre looking to partner with mission aligned individuals: experts who‚Äôve helped companies deploy GenAI in live workflows or builders who have coached teams on the practical nuances of adopting Gen AI in the workplace.

If this sounds like you or someone you know, please DM me. We would love to learn from your experience and explore meaningful collaborations.
